## textInput() function

Create a textInput component builder.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function textInput(options?: TextInputBuilderOptions): ComponentBuilder<TextInputModel>;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

_(Optional)_


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[ComponentBuilder](./dsl.componentbuilder.md)<!-- -->&lt;[TextInputModel](./textinput.textinputmodel.md)<!-- -->&gt;

## Example


```typescript
const app = createApp()
  .component('nameInput', textInput({
    placeholder: 'Enter your name...',
    width: 40,
    validate: (value) => value.length < 3 ? new Error('Too short') : null
  }))
  .view(({ components }) => components.nameInput)
  .build()
```
